set_notification_message.text:
Layer "return_or_enter" Tmux leader

backslash: Window: right-half
return_or_enter: Open Wezterm
b: Personal profile
w: Open Spotify
t: Open Telegram

Persistent mode - Layer "return_or_enter" Tmux leader

backslash: Window: right-half
return_or_enter: Open Wezterm
b: Personal profile
w: Open Spotify
t: Open Telegram

Layer "w" Window manager

h: Window: focus --boundaries-action wrap-around-the-workspace left
l: Window: focus --boundaries-action wrap-around-the-workspace right
f: Window: fullscreen
b: Window: balance-sizes
hyphen: Window: resize smart -50
equal_sign: Window: resize smart +50
w: Window: layout tiles accordion
tab: Window: focus-back-and-forth
spacebar: Window: layout floating tiling

spacebar: Window: layout floating tiling

set_notification_message.text:
Layer "s" System layer

j: Decrement brightness
k: Increment brightness
n: Clear notifications
hyphen: Decrease volume
equal_sign: Increase volume
p: Toggle play or pause

Persistent mode - Layer "s" System layer

j: Decrement brightness
k: Increment brightness
n: Clear notifications
hyphen: Decrease volume
equal_sign: Increase volume
p: Toggle play or pause

rules.description: leader + s + p - Toggle play or pause

manipulators.description: leader + s + p - Toggle play or pause
leader + s + p - Toggle play or pause

set_notification_message.text:
Layer "v" Vim mode

0: Go to begin of line
4: Go to end of line
h: Left arrow
l: Right arrow
k: Up arrow
j: Down arrow
w: Right arrow
b: Left arrow

Persistent mode - Layer "v" Vim mode

0: Go to begin of line
4: Go to end of line
h: Left arrow
l: Right arrow
k: Up arrow
j: Down arrow
w: Right arrow
b: Left arrow

leader + v + 0 - Go to begin of line

rules.description: leader + v + 4 - Go to end of line

set_notification_message.text:
Layer "r" Raycast layer

i: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/raycast-ai/ai-chat
q: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/raycast-ai/search-ai-chat-presets
t: Open my personal snippets gallery
m: Search menu of current app
w: Switch windows with raycast
c: Confetti
d: Do not disturb
e: Emoji finder
p: Raycast color picker
s: My spotify library
o: OCR screen area
